title: Nature-inspired recycling of a protein mixture into a green fluorescent protein-based hydrogel
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00212A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Laura Roset Julià, Sebastian J. Maerkl, Francesco Stellacci
Protein metabolism is a wonderful example of polymer recycling. A random mixture of proteins gets digested into amino acids, which then can be used by cells to produce whichever protein is needed at the time of synthesis.
